description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              -	Take in charge for model develop and transfer to Vietnam. Make SOP, confirm PCB design, follow up new model production, improve production problem.
              
              -	Study and design assembly Jig for NCA model
              
              -	Color control and judgement
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              - University or College degree in Electronics, Electrical, Mechanical, Automation, IT engineering or any related field regarding manufacturing.
              
              - Good written and spoken English.
              
              - Good skill in using Auto Cad, Microsoft Office.
              
              - Experiences in AI, SMT, MI, FA, QC is priority.
              
              - Deep knowledge of ISO quality systems and standards.
              
              - Good organizational & analytical skills.
              
              - Able to handle stressful situations and tight dead-lines.
              
              - Ability to handle multiple tasks at the same time.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc

Các Phúc Lợi Dành Cho Bạn
